name: Reptile Rider
summary: To you, crocodilians, giant lizards, and dinosaurs are loyal steeds, not monsters.
description:
To you, crocodilians, giant lizards, and dinosaurs are loyal steeds, not monsters. You gain the Ride feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Nature checks to Handle an Animal as long as the animal is a reptile, dinosaur, or even a non-sapient dragon.Traits

Lizardfolk: These reptilian humanoids, also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
